name: academic-paper-review
description: Comprehensive academic paper review workflow: data validation, tone formalization, error correction, and reproducibility fixes
objective: Perform systematic review and quality improvement of academic/technical papers including quantitative validation, tone formalization, and reproducibility verification
outcome: Successfully improved paper quality: fixed all errors (spelling, grammar), removed 47+ contractions, marked 24 colloquial segments, validated data accuracy, extracted archives, updated script paths

validated_on.sample_size: N=1 dryrun with N=7 tier comparisons
validated_on.paper_type: Technical research paper with quantitative results

key_learnings: Always verify quantitative claims by recomputing from source data
Create severity-ranked analysis plan before making changes
Two-phase tone improvement: remove contractions first, then mark colloquialisms
Extract archives rather than editing references to nonexistent paths
Use appropriate statistical language for sample sizes (N=1 cannot 'confirm')
failed_approaches: Trusting analysis plan without verification - caused false positive on judge stats
Creating Python scripts for simple text edits - use Edit tool directly instead
Starting fixes without structured plan - 15 min planning saves hours
